post:
Hi Folks,

First offer posted directly on LET

Servers Located within PhoenixNAP, test IP: 199.30.48.189

SPECS:
_XEN PV
4 Cores Equal Share (X3470 @ 2.93GHz)
256MB RAM
256MB SWAP
15GB HDD (Raid 10)
250GB Bandwidth @ 100mbit
1 x IP4_

€4.00 ($5.21 from xe.com) p/month
Sign Up Link: http://inceptionhosting.com/clients/cart.php?a=add&pid=39

No discount or promo code required the prices are being kept low right now for all sign ups to help launch the USA based service, the price you buy at is the price you keep should pricing change in the future.

Paypal and Moneybookers accepted.

As an added bonus anyone who currently has a NL VPS with Inception Hosting is entitled to a 20% credit against the next months invoice for any NL based VPS you already have when you also sign up for any USA based service.

IP6 is not available but should be coming soon.
IRC Not allowed (Enforced by network provider)

Thanks for reading :)

Anthony.
